alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:49PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Graham and northeastern Cochise Counties through 430 PM MST... At 348 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bowie, or 22 miles east of Willcox, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowie and San Simon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 355 and 381. Route 191 near mile marker 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
